src_original: etac ca sarvakleśopakleśasahāyyadānakarmakam /  mohāṃśe prajñaptatvāc ca mohāṃśikam eva na pṛthag vidyate /
tgt_original: 謂貪瞋癡分，於諸過惡不羞他為體，一切煩惱及隨煩惱助伴為業。

src_original: auddhatyaṃ cittasyāvyupaśamaḥ /  vyupaśamo hi śamathas tadviruddho 'vyupaśamaḥ /
tgt_original: 何等惛沈？ 謂愚癡分，心無堪任為體，障毘鉢舍那為業。 何等掉舉？

src_original: sa punar eṣa rāgānukūlaṃ pūrvahasitarasitakrīḍitādyanusmarataś cetaso 'vyupaśamahetuḥ śamathaparipanthakarmakaḥ /
tgt_original: 謂貪欲分，隨念淨相心不寂靜為體，障奢摩他為業。

src_original: āśraddhyāṃ karmaphalasatyaratneṣv anabhisaṃpratyayaḥ śraddhāvipakṣaḥ /  śraddhā hy astitvaguṇavattvaśakyatveṣv abhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādo 'bhilāṣaś ca yathākramam /

tgt_original: 謂愚癡分，於諸善法心不忍可、心不清淨、心不希望為體，懈怠所依為業。

src_original: kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso 'nabhyutsāhaḥ /  etac ca kuśalapakṣaprayogaparipanthakarmakam /
tgt_original: 謂愚癡分，依著睡眠倚臥為樂、心不策勵為體，障修方便善品為業。
謂依懈怠及貪瞋癡不修善法，於有漏法心不防護為體，憎惡損善所依為業。
